img_summary: The image depicts the "Lambrew," a rare healing item in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This item is described as a drinking vessel shaped like a ram's head and is used to recover health. Each sip instantly restores 20% of maximum health and provides gradual recovery of an additional 25%. It is found behind the Sandgate Village - Village Entrance Shrine, at the start of Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, located up the hill to the right of the spawn point.
